item.description: As voted upon at the last meeting, we will combine our ride and our meeting. Looks like the weather will be great!!  Hoping to be at the parking area between 1:30, 2 pm, following the PMS "maintenance" portion of our day at HD Cycles.  We will have some interesting things on the agenda!  There are only 2 picnic tables, so if you have a small folding seat you may want to bring it along. Don't forget your sunscreen!  This is our last Sunday meeting until October, the rest will be on the 3rd Tuesday eve each month.
item.name: General Members Meeting
